data.name: Paranoya
data.detailed_description:
In this game, you are a first person character that has been taken away from the earth and put into liminal and supernatural realms by demons because of your past sins. You must escape through 4 different dimensions and fight multiple creatures with different abilities and weapons to come back to earth.

CAGE LEVEL

In this level, you are put in a cage. There are security cameras watching you that are broadcasting it live on television, you are also being watched by other creatures. You must find hints to escape alive.

PLAY ROOM LEVEL

After escaping the cage, you find a way to a different dimension where whales want to eat you and everything looks un natural, there is water everywhere and more creatures that are also holding you back from escaping back to reality.

PLAY GROUND LEVEL

You're in the forest and find a castle, complete puzzles without dying to creatures to move on to the next.

MANSION LEVEL

This is the final level where you make it into the demons house, you must break in, steal his loot and defeat him to avenge your suffering.

data.short_description: This is a liminal horror game where you are sent to supernatural dimensions, you must defeat the demon and his workers though multiple levels to escape and go back to your normal life.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Processor: 2.0GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 or DirectX 9.0c compatible
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
